body_html:
bazel version
/bin/bash: warning: setlocale: LC_ALL: cannot change locale (en_us.UTF-8)
WARNING: ignoring http_proxy in environment.
Build label: 0.6.1
Build target: bazel-out/local-fastbuild/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Thu Oct 5 21:54:59 2017 (1507240499)
Build timestamp: 1507240499
Build timestamp as int: 1507240499

I try this command but it does not work.

sudo -E bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package --verbose_failures

WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: opt
ERROR: /home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/numpy/BUILD:11:1: no such package '@local_config_python//': Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 310

_get_python_bin(repository_ctx)
File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 166, in _get_python_bin
_get_env_var(repository_ctx, _PYTHON_BIN_PATH, No..., ...)
File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 49, in _get_env_var
_python_configure_fail(("'%s' environment variable is n...))
File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 37, in _python_configure_fail
fail(("%sPython Configuration Error:%...)))
Python Configuration Error: 'PYTHON_BIN_PATH' environment variable is not set
and referenced by '//third_party/py/numpy:headers'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted

FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (25 packages loaded)
currently loading: tensorflow/core

body:
bazel version
/bin/bash: warning: setlocale: LC_ALL: cannot change locale (en_us.UTF-8)
WARNING: ignoring http_proxy in environment.
Build label: 0.6.1
Build target: bazel-out/local-fastbuild/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Thu Oct 5 21:54:59 2017 (1507240499)
Build timestamp: 1507240499
Build timestamp as int: 1507240499

I try this command but it does not work.

sudo -E bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package --verbose_failures


WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: opt
ERROR: /home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/numpy/BUILD:11:1: no such package '@local_config_python//': Traceback (most recent call last):
        File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 310
                _create_local_python_repository(repository_ctx)
        File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 268, in _create_local_python_repository
                _get_python_bin(repository_ctx)
        File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 166, in _get_python_bin
                _get_env_var(repository_ctx, _PYTHON_BIN_PATH, No..., ...)
        File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 49, in _get_env_var
                _python_configure_fail(("'%s' environment variable is n...))
        File "/home/a_name/tensorflow.build/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl", line 37, in _python_configure_fail
                fail(("%sPython Configuration Error:%...)))
Python Configuration Error: 'PYTHON_BIN_PATH' environment variable is not set
 and referenced by '//third_party/py/numpy:headers'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted
INFO: Elapsed time: 4.234s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (25 packages loaded)
    currently loading: tensorflow/core
